testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to update the existing category information via API connection.
testcase.name: When a POST request with valid authorization information, correct 'id', and valid data (name)
testcase.system-out: Given The API user sets "api/categories/update/46" path parameters..........passed And The API user prepares a POST request containing the name data to send to the api categories update endpoint.passed When The API user records the response from the api categories update endpoint with valid authorization information.passed Then The API user verifies that the status code is 200......................passed
